column5: Hey all.  Does anyone want to get out and go fishing tomorrow?  I'm in the North end of Whitby and my boat is up at the cottage so I'm boat-less...  Cheers.  Geoff

Update, change of plans.  If anyone has a boat and hasn't fished 4 mile lake, tomorrow you are more then welcome to join CCMT and I.  We are going to hook up and get out in my boat at the cottage.  I can show you around and where to go and where to avoid for future trips.  BTW, there are no fish in the lake unless you want perch, blue gill's and WGSF...
WOO HOO!!! WGSF!!  I think I know what I want to target!
HAHA, then we won't even need the boat, LOL!!!

Well since you asked... The morning was a tough time trying to land some fish  We drifted all the way up the lake and were only getting a few bites here and there but not able to land one.  After a while we tried a few places and we were finding fish only to have them spit the hooks on us    so I had a look at my lure and found out I had a blunt spot not a point from a minor snag     So after I fixed that we ended up boating a fish     Then after a double-header (and both spit the hook) we decided we were jinxed and moved again.  A few more fish here and there and all and all it was a great day of fishing and talking.  We almost hit the grandslam, we go bass, walleye, JUMBO perch and a sunfish, just no musky... Thanks for the great day on the water CCMT and like I said, you can come fishing in my boat any time.

Thanks GBW! I had a great day on the water with you.  Not a lot of fish, but we did finally get some.  Great conversation and laughs all day.  I did have hook setting issues, so I'm glad we finally got a few nice fish near the end of the day.  If all goes well, maybe I'll see you next weekend.  If you ever need a body to fill a spot in a boat give me a call.  Its hard to believe actually it took this long for us to fish together...seing as you are only 10 minutes from me! Lol.

Any time man, any time.  And there is another OFC'er who's around the corner from you that we can bring too.  Thanks for the great time today. PS, the smoker is going on tomorrow for that walleye and that jumbo perch, muuhahahaha
Some fish pic from today...  BTW....what time is dinner??? LOL  Oh, and I caught the jinxed comment! Lol          That was a monster perch you caught!!!
LOL, I fugured you got that comment.  As for the perch, it was HUGE!!!!!  Again it was a great day and I  had a great day.
edit due to double post...  also, dinner went quick as everyone around wanted the smoked walleye and perch...
thats good to hear you got out fishing with cliff. he's a great guy and tons of fun to be around.
Where the heck have you been?  LOL
Yeah, I hear ya.  I had the same problem there 2 weeks ago...  But at least you got out...
